name: io.github.awslabs/log-analyzer-cloudwatch
title: Log Analyzer with CloudWatch Logs
description: Access AWS CloudWatch Logs for searching, analyzing, and correlating logs across services.

packageArguments.description: Specify the source for the uvx package
Git repository URL for the package source
Entry point command to start the MCP server

packageArguments.name: --profile
packageArguments.description: AWS profile name to use for credentials. Defaults to the default AWS profile if not specified.

packageArguments.name: --region
packageArguments.description: AWS region for CloudWatch Logs API calls (e.g., us-east-1, eu-west-1).

environmentVariables.name: AWS_PROFILE
environmentVariables.description: AWS profile to use for authentication. Alternative to the --profile argument.

environmentVariables.name: AWS_DEFAULT_REGION
environmentVariables.description: AWS default region for API calls (e.g., us-east-1). Used by boto3. Alternative to the --region argument.

environmentVariables.name: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID
environmentVariables.description: AWS access key for programmatic authentication.

environmentVariables.name: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
environmentVariables.description: AWS secret access key for programmatic authentication.

environmentVariables.name: AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: AWS session token for temporary credential authentication.

name: io.github.crystaldba/postgres-mcp
title: PostgreSQL MCP Pro
description: PostgreSQL tuning and analysis with index tuning, explain plans, and health checks.

packageArguments.name: --access-mode
packageArguments.description: Database access mode. 'restricted' for read-only with resource limits (production), 'unrestricted' for full read/write (development).

environmentVariables.name: DATABASE_URI
environmentVariables.description: PostgreSQL connection URI, composed from PG_USER, PG_PASSWORD, PG_HOST, PG_PORT, and PG_DATABASE.

packageArguments.name: --access-mode
packageArguments.description: Database access mode. 'restricted' for read-only with resource limits (production), 'unrestricted' for full read/write (development).

environmentVariables.name: DATABASE_URI
environmentVariables.description: PostgreSQL connection URI, composed from PG_USER, PG_PASSWORD, PG_HOST, PG_PORT, and PG_DATABASE.

name: io.github.awslabs/aws-iac-mcp-server
title: AWS Infrastructure as Code
description: CloudFormation validation, compliance checking, CDK guidance, and deployment troubleshooting.

environmentVariables.name: AWS_PROFILE
environmentVariables.description: Named AWS CLI profile to use for authentication.

environmentVariables.name: AWS_DEFAULT_REGION
environmentVariables.description: AWS region for API calls (e.g., us-east-1).

environmentVariables.name: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID
environmentVariables.description: AWS access key for programmatic authentication.

environmentVariables.name: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
environmentVariables.description: AWS secret access key for programmatic authentication.

environmentVariables.name: AWS_SESSION_TOKEN
environmentVariables.description: AWS session token for temporary credential authentication.

environmentVariables.name: FASTMCP_LOG_LEVEL
environmentVariables.description: Logging level for the FastMCP framework (e.g., ERROR, WARNING, INFO, DEBUG).

name: io.github.xing5/mcp-google-sheets
title: Google Sheets
description: Read, create, and modify Google Sheets spreadsheets via the Google Sheets and Drive APIs.

packageArguments.name: --include-tools
packageArguments.description: Comma-separated list of tool names to enable. Reduces context usage when only a subset of the 19 tools is needed.

environmentVariables.name: SERVICE_ACCOUNT_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Path to a Google Cloud Service Account JSON key file. Recommended for server/automation use.

environmentVariables.name: DRIVE_FOLDER_ID
environmentVariables.description: Google Drive folder ID to scope spreadsheet access. The service account must have access to this folder.

environmentVariables.name: CREDENTIALS_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Path to an OAuth 2.0 client credentials JSON file (for interactive/personal use).

environmentVariables.name: TOKEN_PATH
environmentVariables.description: Path to store the OAuth token file after authorization.

environmentVariables.name: CREDENTIALS_CONFIG
environmentVariables.description: Base64-encoded Google Cloud credential JSON. Alternative to file-based credential paths.

environmentVariables.name: ENABLED_TOOLS
environmentVariables.description: Comma-separated list of tool names to enable. Alternative to the --include-tools argument.
